New Records: Steph Curry became the oldest point guard in NBA history with consecutive 30-point games.
Steph Curry joined LeBron James and Michael Jordan as the only other 36-year-old with back-to-back 35-point games.
Key Match Events: Steph Curry finished with a game-high 37 points to secure the win.
Klay Thompson tallied 22 points on 6/12 from three-point range in his return to the Bay.
Pre-Game Insights: The Golden State Warriors welcomed back franchise legend Klay Thompson, who signed with Dallas this offseason.
Post-Match Reflections: The loss dropped Dallas to 5-6, which is a disappointing start after their NBA Finals run.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Golden State Warriors are now 9-2 through 11 games, tied for the best record in the Western Conference.
